original_text: They made their hearts as hard as flint and would not listen to the law or to the words that the Lord Almighty had sent by his Spirit through the earlier prophets. So the Lord Almighty was very angry.
korean_text: 그 마음을 금강석 같게 하여 율법과 만군의 여호와가 그의 영으로 옛 선지자들을 통하여 전한 말을 듣지 아니하므로 큰 진노가 만군의 여호와께로부터 나왔도다

sentences.original_text: They made their hearts as hard as flint
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들의 마음을 부싯돌처럼 단단하게 만들었고

sentences.original_text: and would not listen to the law
or to the words that the Lord Almighty had sent
by his Spirit through the earlier prophets
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 영으로 이전 선지자들을 통해 보내신 말씀에

sentences.original_text: So the Lord Almighty was very angry
